name: Jazz Jackrabbit 2
description: Installs Jazz Jackrabbit 2 from a GOG installer
notes: Use the JJ2+ version from GOG.com (required for online play) Download JJ2+ directly from GOG.com

files.setup: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Jazz Jackrabbit 2 with JJ2+ installer executable

content:
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Games/Jazz2/Jazz2.exe
  args: -windowed
  prefix: $GAMEDIR

files:
- setup: 'N/A:Please select the GOG.com Jazz Jackrabbit 2 with JJ2+ installer executable'
- helper: https://gist.github.com/daniel-j/83bf128212c085cc99989e4d1e33ffb1/archive/master.zip

installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    description: Creating Wine prefix

- task:
    name: set_regedit
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Epic MegaGames\Jazz Jackrabbit 2 Special Edition\1.24\System
    key: Last VideoMode
    type: 'REG_BINARY'
    value: 04 00 00 00
- task:
    name: set_regedit
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Explorer
    key: Desktop
    value: Installing Jazz Jackrabbit 2
- task:
    name: set_regedit
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Explorer\Desktops
    key: Installing Jazz Jackrabbit 2
    value: 800x600

- task:
    args: /SP- /DIR="C:\\Games\\Jazz2" /NOICONS /NORESTART /CLOSEAPPLICATIONS
    description: Installing game
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    exclude_processes: jazz2.exe
- task:
    name: set_regedit
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Explorer
    key: Desktop
    value: ''
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    description: Stopping wine processes

- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/helper/
    file: helper

# Enable high quality audio (and reset keybindings)
- merge:
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/helper/JAZZ2.CFG
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Games/Jazz2/

# Tweak JJ2+ settings
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Games/Jazz2/plus.ini
    key: GameInfo
    section: General
    value: 1
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Games/Jazz2/plus.ini
    key: PlayerListSort
    section: General
    value: 2
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Games/Jazz2/plus.ini
    key: MouseAim
    section: General
    value: false
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Games/Jazz2/plus.ini
    key: AllowSpectating
    section: Server
    value: true

# Set some good registry defaults
- task:
    name: set_regedit_file
    filename: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/helper/reset.reg
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    description: Applying some registry fixes
